Smile.name: Smile!
Smile.comments: Changelog: ------------------------ **v1.8** -Fixed the tray icon's right click 'about' menu item. -Added Counter-Strike: Condition Zero support (thanks Jake) -Added Ricochet support (thanks T@T-5-MoNk3y) -Added the ability to adjust priority thanks to feedback (Thanks eram) -Improved Cross platform compatability. -Redid parts of the logging system again. Should provide some better information.
